mapper.select: SELECT m.item_id AS itemId, m.img_id AS imgId, m.menu_category_code AS menuCategoryCode, m.menu_checked AS menuChecked, c.type AS menuCategory, i.item_name AS itemName, i.selling_price AS sellingPrice FROM menu m LEFT JOIN item i ON m.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN common_code c ON m.menu_category_code = c.code WHERE m.menu_checked = 'Y'

SELECT m.item_id, m.img_id, m.menu_category_code, m.menu_checked, i.item_id, i.item_name, i.selling_price, i.stock, i.item_type_code, i.reg_date, c.type as menu_category FROM menu m INNER JOIN item i ON m.item_id = i.item_id INNER JOIN common_code c ON m.menu_category_code = c.code WHERE m.menu_checked = #{menuChecked}
and m.menu_category_code = #{menuCategoryCode}
